title: Where to look up store data?
lead: All essential information is available on the company's Intranet.
intro_p: It's your main work tool for quick and accurate queries.
highlight_text: Intranet ‚Üí Branches ‚Üí Registration data and schedules
slider_title: üìç How to search on the Intranet:

s3.title: Step 3: Registration Data
s3.text: Then click on 'Registration data and schedules'.

s4.title: Step 4: Query and Inform
s4.text: Now you can query information from all group units, including: Address, Opening hours and Contact methods to guide the customer!

quiz1.question: A customer calls asking if the Downtown store is open on tomorrow's holiday. You don't know this off the top of your head. What's the fastest and safest procedure?
quiz1.opt_a: A) Quickly ask in the team WhatsApp group to see if anyone knows.
quiz1.opt_b: B) Check the Intranet in 'Branches' > 'Registration data and schedules' to get official information.
quiz1.opt_c: C) Search on Google Maps, as it's always updated there.
quiz1.opt_d: D) Inform that it's probably closed, to prevent the customer from wasting a trip.
quiz1.feedback: Correct Answer! The Intranet is the only official and reliable source for branch schedules.

importance_text: Mastering this query ensures agility in service, more assertive responses, standardization of information and a more positive experience for the customer.

quiz2.question: Mastering information queries on the Intranet contributes to:
quiz2.opt_c: C) Ensuring agility, assertiveness and better customer experience.
quiz2.feedback: Correct Answer! Happy customer is a customer served with agility and accuracy.
